tours.title: Our Tours
tours.subtitle: Discover authentic experiences across Uzbekistan with our licensed guides

tourDescriptions.1: Journey through the ancient cities of the Silk Road, exploring magnificent madrasas, mausoleums, and bazaars.
tourDescriptions.2: Step back in time in this UNESCO World Heritage site, exploring the perfectly preserved medieval city.
tourDescriptions.3: Experience the capital blend of Soviet architecture, modern developments, and traditional bazaars.
tourDescriptions.4: Explore traditional crafts, silk production, and mountain landscapes in this fertile valley.
tourDescriptions.5: Visit the most sacred Islamic sites in Uzbekistan, including ancient mosques and pilgrimage sites.
tourDescriptions.6: Witness the environmental changes and local resilience in this challenging but rewarding expedition.
tourDescriptions.7: Explore futuristic architecture, luxury shopping, and desert adventures in dazzling Dubai.
tourDescriptions.8: Discover the historic mosques, bustling bazaars of Istanbul and the surreal landscapes of Cappadocia.
tourDescriptions.9: Taste world-famous Georgian wines and explore the breathtaking Caucasus mountains.
tourDescriptions.10: Relax on tropical beaches, visit ancient temples, and taste local street food in Thailand.
tourDescriptions.11: Enjoy pristine beaches, ancient ruins, and the charming old town of Antalya.
tourDescriptions.12: Discover Abu Dhabi's blend of modern luxury and cultural heritage with mosque visits and desert safari.
tourDescriptions.13: Explore Indonesia's diverse islands: Bali's beautiful temples and beaches, and Java's volcanic landscapes.

descriptions.1: Journey through the ancient cities of the Silk Road, exploring magnificent madrasas, mausoleums, and bazaars.
descriptions.2: Step back in time in this UNESCO World Heritage site, exploring the perfectly preserved medieval city.
descriptions.3: Experience the capital blend of Soviet architecture, modern developments, and traditional bazaars.
descriptions.4: Explore traditional crafts, silk production, and mountain landscapes in this fertile valley.
descriptions.5: Visit the most sacred Islamic sites in Uzbekistan, including ancient mosques and pilgrimage sites.
descriptions.6: Witness the environmental changes and local resilience in this challenging but rewarding expedition.
descriptions.7: Explore futuristic architecture, luxury shopping, and desert adventures in dazzling Dubai.
descriptions.8: Discover the historic mosques, bustling bazaars of Istanbul and the surreal landscapes of Cappadocia.
descriptions.9: Taste world-famous Georgian wines and explore the breathtaking Caucasus mountains.
descriptions.10: Relax on tropical beaches, visit ancient temples, and taste local street food in Thailand.
descriptions.11: Enjoy pristine beaches, ancient ruins, and the charming old town of Antalya. Relax by the sea and explore historical sites that reveal the rich history of Turkey’s Mediterranean coast.
descriptions.12: Discover Abu Dhabi’s blend of modern luxury and cultural heritage. Visit the stunning Sheikh Zayed Mosque, explore the Louvre Abu Dhabi, and experience the thrill of a desert safari.
descriptions.13: Explore Indonesia's diverse islands: Bali’s beautiful temples and beaches, and Java’s volcanic landscapes and ancient wonders. An unforgettable mix of culture and nature.

about.title: About Mabrur Travel - Your Trusted Partner
about.subtitle: Licensed and certified tour operator in Uzbekistan
about.description: We are a fully licensed and certified tour operator in Uzbekistan, committed to providing authentic, safe, and memorable experiences along the historic Silk Road routes.
about.missionText: To showcase the rich cultural heritage, architectural wonders, and natural beauty of Uzbekistan while maintaining the highest standards of service, safety, and authentic local experiences.
about.cert1: Licensed Tour Operator by Ministry of Tourism
about.directorQuote: "As the Director of Mabrur Travel, our main goal is to showcase Uzbekistan's unique cultural heritage to the world and create unforgettable experiences for each of our guests. With our professional team and years of experience, we are ready to provide you with the best service."
about.directorExperience: 10+ years of experience in tourism industry

legal.acceptanceText1: By accessing and using the services provided by Mabrur Travel LLC, you accept and agree to be bound by the terms and provision of this agreement.
legal.acceptanceText2: These terms comply with the tourism regulations of Uzbekistan as per Resolution No. 433, 2020, and other applicable laws governing tour operators in Uzbekistan.
legal.electronicContractText: Electronic contracts formed through our booking system are legally binding under Uzbekistan's Electronic Commerce Law. By submitting a booking form, you agree to:
legal.electronicList2: Accept electronic delivery of contract documents
legal.electronicList3: Comply with payment terms and conditions
legal.bookingPaymentText: All bookings require advance payment. Full payment terms will be provided upon booking confirmation.
legal.cancellationPolicyText: Cancellations must be made in writing. Cancellation fees apply according to our published policy.
legal.travelInsuranceText: We strongly recommend travel insurance. Mabrur Travel is not responsible for costs arising from unforeseen circumstances.
legal.itineraryChangesText: We reserve the right to modify itineraries due to weather, safety, or other operational considerations.
legal.licensingText1: Mabrur Travel LLC operates under license from the State Committee for Tourism Development of Uzbekistan. Our license number is LIC-TUR-987654.
legal.licensingText2: All our guides are licensed and certified according to Uzbekistan tourism standards. We maintain appropriate insurance coverage as required by law.
legal.licensingText3: This website and our services comply with Resolution No. 433 dated July 3, 2020, regarding tourism operator licensing requirements.
legal.liabilityText: Our liability is limited to the value of services purchased. We are not liable for delays, cancellations, or changes due to circumstances beyond our control, including but not limited to weather, political situations, or force majeure events.
legal.governingLawText: These terms are governed by the laws of the Republic of Uzbekistan. Any disputes shall be resolved in accordance with Uzbekistan jurisdiction.
legal.infoCollectText: We collect information you provide directly to us, such as when you:
legal.infoList2: Contact us through our website or email
legal.infoCollectDetails: This may include your name, email address, phone number, travel preferences, and payment information.
legal.dataList1: Process and fulfill your travel bookings
legal.dataList2: Communicate with you about your trips
legal.dataList3: Send you updates and promotional materials (with consent)
legal.dataList4: Improve our services and customer experience
legal.dataSharingText1: We do not sell or rent your personal information to third parties. We may share your information with:
legal.sharingList1: Service providers who assist in trip arrangements
legal.dataSharingText2: We implement appropriate security measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction.
legal.retentionText: We retain your personal information for as long as necessary to provide services and comply with legal obligations. You may request deletion of your data at any time, subject to legal requirements.
legal.contactPrivacyText: If you have questions about this privacy policy or our data practices, please contact us at privacy@mabrurtur.uz or +998 99 313 98 98.
